text: Twoja twarz brzmi znajomo is a Polish reality show broadcast on Polsat. The sixth season premiered on 3 September 2016. Piotr Gąsowski and Maciej Dowbor returned as the hosts. The judges were Paweł Królikowski, Katarzyna Skrzynecka, Małgorzata Walewska and Bartłomiej Kasprzykowski. ==Contestants== {| class="wikitable" style="width:75%;" |- ! Celebrity ! Known for ! Episodes won ! Episodes lost !
